listitem.para: By default, &slsa; &minvm; has no software channels. You need to register your system to access online channels.

While &sles; calculates the disk layout during installation, &slsa; &minvm; features the following fixed virtual image partitioning scheme (2 MB BIOS boot, 33 MB EFI boot, 24 GB Linux file system). To get additional disk space, you can either extend the existing disk from the virtual host or add a secondary disk to the virtual machine.
&slsa; &minvm; images have systemd-coredump disabled by default.
